Ordered a small. The cut is very wide and the fit is too large! If you’re going to wear it buttoned up, it’s more flattering with a shirt underneath and the cardigan left unbuttoned.

I really wanted to love this cardigan. It was lovely, soft, and comfy to wear. But I ordered a small and it was just a bag on me! And I pretty much am a medium size. Stop making sweaters so big and baggy!! Forced to return.

Very nice quality especially for the price! Very soft, not too thin or thick. I got the black and white, the colors are nice and bright. Buttons look expensive! Overall a very classy sweater! I purchased my usual size and the fit is great.
I bought this for my mother, who is in assisted living in Maine. She loves it! She said that she had received many compliments on it and that it's warm and comfortable.
I like the fit and cut. Quality material.

I got this sweater in black and loved it. It will look a little fancy during the holidays. I decided to get another in pink. It was so big!!! The pink was really a "salmon" color, which was ok. It was pretty. I'm tempted to get another, but am wary of the inconsistency of sizes. I ordered the same size as the black. But this one was just way too big.  But if you can find your size, it's perfect to dress up or down. ♡♡♡♡♡

评论概述: Classic Style at the right price

I love a houndstooth print and fell in love as soon as I saw it. The sale price was an added bonus. I read some of the other reviews before making my purchase and I'm glad I did. It is a sweater and not a jacket. From the picture I thought it was blazer style jacket. The weight and gage of the sweater is nice. It is soft and the buttons add a touch and look of sophistication. Amazon's recommended size for me was large but I went with medium and glad I did. The medium size was perfect fit.

This blue and white button-up cardigan sweater is perfect for work! It’s not only stylish but also incredibly soft and comfortable, making it ideal for all-day wear. The color combination is beautiful and adds a polished touch to any outfit, whether dressed up with slacks or paired with jeans for a more casual look. The fabric feels luxurious, and the fit is flattering without being too tight. It’s warm enough to layer but light enough not to overheat, so it’s versatile for any season. Highly recommend for anyone looking to add a cozy, professional piece to their wardrobe!

Cute design and look. Cute sweater! Perfect for everyday, work  or dress up. It's pretty and has pearl like buttons. Sharp I love it. I am short. This is perfect for me but I am short. Hits me at my waist.

The pictures show a super cute sweater. When I got it home, I wasn't as impressed with the material it's made out of. It's a really loose weave and honestly doesn't quite look like the picture from close-up. The buttons are pearlized and actually quite large. I found the fit in the arms to be quite boxy and large, even though I have a larger bust line. I think this is a matter of taste, so, if you don't mind a large weave,  which I thought would catch on things and you might consider replacing the buttons, this might work out for you.

This product is beautiful and looks decent quality.  Got on sale for around $25.  I got the pink and it is true to color.  Unfortunately it is made more for petite women. It's really classy, so really sucks it doesn't look nice in me. Gave it 5 stars because it is still very nice quality.  I really don't want to return it!  Thinking of giving to a friend who is petite
